title.narrative: COMMUNITY HEALTH STRUCTURES

description.narrative: MOHSW, LGAs and Shehias strengthen community health structures and communication strategies for promoting health and nutrition behaviours, which contributes to Child Health, Community-Based Management Of Acute Malnutrition, Infant And Young Child Feeding, Maternal And Newborn Health. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Improved and equitable use of high impact Maternal, Neonatal, and Child Health (MNCH) and nutrition interventions and promotion of healthy behaviours and nutrition practices

sector.narrative: IMNCI / Integrated Community Case Management (iCCM) - Community
Immunization supply chain, including cold chain

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: MOHSW, LGAs and Shehias strengthen community health structures and communication strategies for promoting health and nutritionbehaviours

description.narrative: Community health structures were strengthened via the successful recognition and inclusion of community health workers into the rural health scheme with an initial batch of 4000 trained and supported. | Status:Met | As-of Date:27/07/2016

title.narrative: Infants aged <6 months in targeted Local Government Authorities who are exclusively breastfed

actual.value: 2016:In 2010, exclusive breastfeeding rate among infants below 6 months was 50%. The rate has increased to 59% (TDHS 2015/16)

title.narrative: % of pregnant women in target regions delivered by skilled health personnel

baseline.value: 80.8% of births delivered by skilled provider in Iringa (includes Njombe), 42.9% in Mbeya

title.narrative: Status of the Community Based Health Care (CBHC) guideline and Behavour Change Communication (BCC) Strategy

target.value: 2016:CBHC guideline and BCC strategy developed in Mainland & Zanzibar

actual.value: 2016:Community Based Health Programme guideline and costed strategic are implemented in UNICEF focus regions.

title.narrative: Ministry of Health and Social Welfare-HPU implementing the Health and Nutrition Strategy

baseline.value: No comprehensive National Health Promotion and Disease Prevention Strategy

target.value: 2016:Targets for First phase implementation of Communication Strategy met

actual.value: 2016:Targets for the implemetation of National Health Promotion policy guideline and strategy are met
